          <title>
            <string language="en">Energy transfer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energieübertragung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Transfert d'énergie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Transferência de energia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Trasferimento di energia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενεργειακή μεταφορά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Transferencia de energía</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows how much useful energy in the form of heat, movement and sound is transferred from fuel.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">energy transfer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fuel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">movement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sound</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt, wieviel nützliche Energie 
in Form von Hitze, Bewegung und Ton vom Kraftstoff übertragen wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre combien d'énergie utile sous
forme de chaleur, de mouvement et de bruit est transférée à partir 
du carburant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra quanto energia útil no 
formulário do calor, do movimento e do som é transferida do 
combustível.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra quanto energia utile sotto 
forma di calore, movimento ed il suono è trasferita da combustibile.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει πόση χρήσιμη ενέργεια 
υπό μορφή θερμότητας, μετακίνησης και ήχου μεταφέρεται από τα 
καύσιμα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra cuánto energía útil en 
la forma de calor, de movimiento y de sonido se transfiere del 
combustible.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energieübertragung</string>
          </keyword>
